name: John Brick (itch)
description:
"L" to Toggle Fullscreen

Your dog was murdered with a brick by a billionaire criminal. You will use only one weapon to exact revenge. That same brick. You will execute everyone in his skyscraper. The gameplay is a mix between Peggle and hotline Miami. You can bounce the brick and you must retrieve it.

Obviously, there's a lot I would have liked to add here. Sound. More game feel. Building on combos. More levels.  A timer. A level Editor. Better Art. I was a day short, but I had a blast, and learned a lot!
